short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension to sync Kindle highlights with Notion

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
âž• Easily add new books to your Notion reading list

For those who maintain their reading lists in Notion, it can be a pain to fill in all the properties such as title, author and book cover, when adding a new book. When you are browsing a book in the Amazon or Good Reads website, it can be added with one click from our browser extension, and all details will be automatically populated.

ðŸ”„ Automatically synchronize your Kindle highlights with Notion

The browser extension will automatically sync any highlights from Kindle purchased books with Notion. Keep your favourite quotes when reading, to revisit and refresh later on Notion
